channel.title: Error Success Glitch
channel.description: I didn't see anyone else who had this...odd glitch, not sure how to fix it. The word "Error Success" replaces some prop items or seems to appear randomly. I can still play the game, but it is kinda distracting. And sorry about the quality of the pics, the screenshot doesn't seem to want to work either and I had to grab them with my phone. ![20120915_153332.jpg|690x500](upload://87Cytu3h6xrAxEITKezOSjr7ZGz.jpeg) ![20120915_153452.jpg|690x500](upload://gQp7qVlNhY91DVDxsXmvsGeEVSC.jpeg)

item.title: Error Success Glitch
item.dc:creator: sortofgeekgirl
item.description:
Nairo:

I downloadet the official torrent and the file can’t be damaged, since the models were loaded just fine, when I played the same level for the first time.

I’m now reinstalling the game and will tell you if it had any effect.

Edit: It works now, but the console is still loaded with errors and warnings.

I reloaded it too, and am still getting the same thing as I posted before. Maybe I should try a fresh Steam reinstall… It wouldn’t matter so much, but the “Error Success” word also replaces that ladder you climb up to activate the beam before pushing the crystal in and it can be hit and miss trying to climb it.

Read full topic

item.title: Error Success Glitch
item.dc:creator: Nairo
item.description:
I downloadet the official torrent and the file can’t be damaged, since the models were loaded just fine, when I played the same level for the first time.

I’m now reinstalling the game and will tell you if it had any effect.

Edit: It works now, but the console is still loaded with errors and warnings.

item.title: Error Success Glitch
item.dc:creator: sortofgeekgirl
item.description:
When I go to the SDK Base, it says “Node Graph out of Date. Rebuilding…” and the fly through has the same “Error” words, though it gets stuck when trying to pass the beached boat in the beginning. Going to try contacting Valve/Steam again, I don’t think my first question went through…

Read full topic

item.title: Error Success Glitch
item.dc:creator: sortofgeekgirl
item.description:
Madcat1030:

Is the mod in …/sourcemods/BMS/ ? Anything else could cause problems. Otherwise, it looks like the models just weren’t properly downloaded or installed.

Yes, it is one of the first things I checked when I saw it happen. I did did the video view in SDK Base 2007 and I got the same thing…two big “Error” words on either side of a boat during a fly through of the video, which stalled after trying to pass one of the “Error” words.

Read full topic

item.title: Error Success Glitch
item.dc:creator: sortofgeekgirl
item.description:
Nairo:

I have the same issue. The odd thing is that it wasn’t there yesterday.

Edit:

The console says things like

“SOLID_VPHYSICS static prop with no vphysics model! (models/props_industrial/silo_wall_support.mdl)”

"KeyValues Error: RecursiveLoadFromBuffer: got } in key in file models/props_blastpit/railing01_medium_blastpit.mdl
mdlkeyvalue, bone_followers, "

“Error! Variable “$detail” is multiply defined in material “models/zombies/zscient_b”!”

"Warning: using WorldTwoTextureBlend on a non-displacement surface.
Support for this will go away soon.

  • Material : decals/letters/decal_numbers_yellow_02
  • Surface center : 27 0 -1"

Out of curiosity, which mirror site did you download the game from? I downloaded it from Fileshack. Could some of the images been damaged somehow?

Read full topic

item.title: Error Success Glitch
item.dc:creator: Madcat1030
item.description:
Is the mod in …/sourcemods/BMS/ ? Anything else could cause problems. Otherwise, it looks like the models just weren’t properly downloaded or installed.

Read full topic

item.title: Error Success Glitch
item.dc:creator: sortofgeekgirl
item.description:
sortofgeekgirl:

I do have the SDK Base 2007 installed and I’ll let you know what happens when I verify it.

It looks like it might be a problem with the SDK Base itself and I’ll have to talk to Steam about it if anything else. I’m going to look a little closer at my tools and see if there is anything I’m missing that would solve the problem.

Read full topic

item.title: Error Success Glitch
item.dc:creator: sortofgeekgirl
item.description:
ThePuddingMaster:

Do you have source SDK base 2007 installed? The missing models might be from there, you could always try verifying the SDK if you do have it.

I do have the SDK Base 2007 installed and I’ll let you know what happens when I verify it.

item.description:
I didn’t see anyone else who had this…odd glitch, not sure how to fix it. The word “Error Success” replaces some prop items or seems to appear randomly. I can still play the game, but it is kinda distracting. And sorry about the quality of the pics, the screenshot doesn’t seem to want to work either and I had to grab them with my phone.
